a0yodLze7gs.Document Title: This paper gives a new kind of comprehension to disentangled representation learning. In this paper, existing unsupervised disentangled methods are trying to obtain disentangled action sequences instead of independent factors. Through the proposed FVAE model, action sequences with different levels of significance can be obtained step by step, and experiment results show that the weight  eta has positive correlation with the significance.
